message.raw:
Bug fixes

* In camera.py, the h5file path was not passed to starting_experiment_sockets() and thus the process crashed when not using ZMQ to communicate. This bug was introduced in changeset:9ecd0a62e81b
* In pulseblaster.py, the program_buffered() method attempted to access the hdf5 file after it was closed to read out wait information. This bug was introduced in changeset:e1f5523ea019

Both issues are now resolved
